DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this in-clinic study is to test our closed-loop glucose control system in patients with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: DiaCon Overnight Closed-Loop Glucose Control Study
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 years Type 1 diabetes duration > 2 years HbA1c < 8% Insulin pump user > 1 year Use of medication affecting glucose metabolism Pregnancy or nursing
